name: 摩美々
text:
それでは第一回田中杯
『映えるペンケースの中身選手権』を始めまぁす
trans:
We will commence with the first Tanaka Cup...
"Photogenic Pen Case Contents Championships"

name: 摩美々
text:
一本勝負
最下位の者はドリンクバー３人分をごちそうすることー
trans:
A single match. The one in last place
will pay the bill for our three drinks at the bar.

name: 摩美々
text: せーの────
trans: Ready, set────

name: 摩美々
text:
──えー、咲耶
ぶっちぎりで最下位じゃんー
trans:
Ehh, Sakuya...
That puts you in last place by a huge margin.

name: 摩美々
text: シャーペンと消しゴムと定規だけとかぁ
trans:
You only have mechanical pencils, an eraser,
and a ruler.

name: 霧子
text:
咲耶さん……
色のペン……使わないの……？
trans:
Sakuya-san… 
You don't use… colored pens...?

name: 咲耶
text:
あぁ、３色ペンならカバンに携帯しているのだけれど
──これでは映えないかい？
trans:
Ah, I carry a three color pen in my bag. 
──Is this not photogenic?

name: 摩美々
text:
……映える映えないの前に
女子高生のペンケースってわからないからぁ
trans:
...Putting photogenicity aside, I can't even
tell that this case belongs to a high school girl.

name: 咲耶
text:
フフッ、しかし霧子のも
そう変わらないようだけれど？
trans:
Hehe, but Kiriko's doesn't seem
to be that much different, does it?

name: 摩美々
text:
──や、霧子はなんで鉛筆なのー
５本も入ってるしー
trans:
──Wait, Kiriko, why wooden pencils?
You even have five of them...

name: 霧子
text:
シャープペンシルだと……
すぐ……折れちゃって
trans:
The lead in... mechanical pencils...
...breaks easy if I use them...

name: 咲耶
text:
あとは消しゴムと定規に
赤ペン、蛍光ペン……
trans:
You have an eraser, a ruler, and
a red pen... highlighter pens too...

name: 摩美々
text:
ふーん……
でも鉛筆キャップが可愛いから霧子の勝ちー
trans:
Hmmm...
But the pencil caps are cute, so Kiriko wins.

name: 咲耶
text:
おや、ミニマリズムの美を
もう少し評価してくれると嬉しかったのだけれど
trans:
Oh my, I'd much appreciate it if the
beauty of minimalism were valued higher.

name: 霧子
text:
ふふっ……
咲耶さんに……勝ったの……？
trans:
Fufu...
I won... over Sakuya-san...?

name: 摩美々
text:
そうー
でも優勝は田中摩美々ですー
trans:
Suuure did.
But the graaand prize winner is Mamimi Tanaka.

name: 霧子
text:
わ……うん……！
かわいくって……ペンがいっぱい……！
trans:
Waa... Yeah...!
It's cute... and it's full of pens...!

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ。なんてカラフルな世界だ……
このアイスクリームは一体──
trans:
Yeah. What a colorful world...
There's even an ice cream here.

name: 摩美々
text: それもペンー
trans: That's also a pen.

name: 霧子
text: ……いい匂いがする……
trans: ...It smells nice...

name: 咲耶
text:
あぁ、確かに
これは香り付きのインクかな……ちょっといいかい？
trans:
Ah, that's true.
Could this be scented ink...? Do you mind?

name: 咲耶＆霧子
text: ──の匂い……
trans:
It smells like melons...
(It smells like strawberries...)

name: 摩美々
text: トロピカルフルーツの匂いだからぁ
trans: It's tropical fruit scented.

name: 摩美々＆咲耶＆霧子
text: ……ふふっ
trans: ...Fufu!

name: 咲耶
text:
──やれやれ、仕方ない
それじゃあここの勘定は私が
trans:
───Well, well... It can't be helped...
Then I shall take the bill here.

name: 摩美々
text:
ふふー
じゃー、ドリンクおかわりしてくー？
trans:
Fufu～
Sooo, shall we get refills for our drinks?

name: 霧子
trans:
Waa...!
Yeah────

name: 霧子
text: ──咲耶さん……いい……？
trans: ──Sakuya-san... Is it alright...?

name: 霧子
text:
放課後に遊ぶの……
久しぶりだから……
trans:
It's been so long... 
Since I've hung out after school...

name: 霧子
text: もうちょっと……
trans: I want to stay a little longer...

name: 咲耶
text:
もちろんさ
この流れなら、トロピカルなフレーバーティーを供したいね
trans:
Of course. With what was said earlier, I ought
to bring in some tropical fruit tea.

name: 咲耶
text:
私が取ってこよう
ふたりは座っていて
trans:
I shall fetch them for you.
Both of you, please sit down.

name: 霧子
trans:
...!
I'm so happy...

name: 摩美々
text: ──メロンかいちごの飲み物でもよかったケドー
trans:
──A melon or strawberry drink would be fine too,
y'know.

name: 霧子
text:
それも……
持ってくる……？
trans:
Should I...
Fetch those too...?

name: 摩美々
text: まぁ、晩ごはん食べれなくなったら困るしー
trans: Nah, it'd be bad if we couldn't finish our dinner.

name: 霧子
text:
……
摩美々ちゃん……
trans:
... 
Mamimi-chan...

name: 霧子
text:
ふふ……
うん……紅茶だけにして……
trans:
Fufu... 
Yeah... Let's just have tea...

name: 霧子
text:
恋鐘ちゃんのごはん……
おいしく……いただこうね……
trans:
And then we can enjoy... 
Kogane-chan's... delicious food...

name: 摩美々
text: うん……
trans: Yeah...

name: 咲耶
text:
さぁ、お待たせ
──これを飲んだら、そろそろいい時間だ
trans:
I've kept you waiting long enough.
──We'll be leaving after drinking this.

name: 霧子
text:
うん……
いただきます……
trans:
Okay... 
Thank you...

name: 摩美々
text:
涙が出るほど
すっぱくなってたりしないー？
trans:
Don't tell me that this is... eye-wateringly
sour or something?

name: 咲耶
text:
クスッ、私は番組スタッフの手先かい？
涙なんて出させないさ。だって────
trans:
Hehe, do I look like an underling for the show staff?
We won't shed any tears. After all────

name: 咲耶
text:
──できるかぎり……
撮影を引っ張りたいと思っているのだから
trans:
──I'd like to extend the length of our shoot...
as much as possible.

name: 咲耶
text:
恋鐘と結華、
２か月後に少し大きな露出を控えているだろう？
trans:
Kogane and Yuika... They'll both be putting up
quite a big show in two months, right?

name: 霧子
text:
あ……うん……！
恋鐘ちゃん……舞台が始まる……
trans:
Ah... Yes...!
Kogane-chan's... stage performance is opening...

name: 摩美々
text: ……ドラマだっけ、三峰ー
trans: ...It's a drama series for Mitsumine, isn't it?

name: 咲耶
text:
そう。『グッドラフ』の初回放送日は約２週間後……
そこから６回分ほどもたせれば、いい宣伝になる
trans:
That's right. "Goodlaugh" will start airing the first
episode two weeks after filming... If we can record
enough for six episodes, it'll be good advertising.

name: 霧子
text: わぁ……！　そうだね……！
trans: Waa...! That's right...!

name: 摩美々
text:
……でも、最短記録の人たちって２回でしょー
２週間以内で退去したってことー？
trans:
...But the shortest record was only two episodes,
right? Doesn't that mean they got kicked out
within two weeks?

name: 咲耶
text: もっと短い可能性もある
trans: It's possible that it could be even shorter.

name: 咲耶
text:
状況はなかなか難しいみたいなんだ
──現場で噂を聞いてね
trans:
Seems that the circumstances are pretty difficult.
──I've heard rumors while on location, but...

name: 咲耶
text:
最近、番組の注目度が高まっていることもあって、
大御所の俳優やグループが出演を望んでいるらしいんだ
trans:
Recently, the show's popularity has been rising,
so they're hoping to get some big name actors
and groups on.

name: 咲耶
text:
それで、私たちの前後いくつかの出演者たちについては
短いスパンでの打ち切りが検討されているってね……
trans:
And considering that the few groups before us
have only been able to last a short span of time...

name: 摩美々
text: ……若手出すのがウリなんじゃなかったのー
trans: ...Isn't their whole appeal to use new talents?

name: 霧子
text:
で、でも……退去は……
涙のポイントが……貯まらなきゃ……
trans:
B-But... We don't have to leave... 
If we don't rack up... more tear points...

name: 咲耶
text:
私たちが泣かないなら、ワサビでもタマネギでも映画でも
きっとなんだって投入されるさ
trans:
If we don't cry, then they'll definitely bring in more
tricks up their sleeve like wasabi or onions or
another movie.

name: 摩美々
text: まぁ、ワサビで咲耶が泣いてたら笑うケドー
trans:
Well, I'd be laughing if Sakuya cries from the
wasabi.

name: 咲耶
text:
フッ、摩美々がタマネギに涙するなら
私も見惚れてしまって泣くどころではないだろうね
trans:
Heh, if Mamimi were brought to tears by onions,
I'd be so charmed that I wouldn't think of crying.

name: 霧子
text:
わたし……映画の時は……
目……つむってるから……！
trans:
If... they show us a movie...
I'll... keep my eyes shut...!

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、頼むよ。しかしいずれにせよ……
そうした力業での強制終了は視野に入れなければならない
trans:
Yeah, I'm counting on you. But sooner or later...
We have to consider the possibility of them using
such tactics to cut it short.

name: 霧子
text:
……
それじゃ……どうしたら……
trans:
...... 
Then... what should we do...?

name: 摩美々
text:
……
視聴率ー……
trans:
...... 
The viewer ratings...

name: 咲耶
text:
そう思う。方法があるとすれば、
ポイントが貯まってしまう前に視聴率を上げること────
trans:
I think so too. If there's something we could do,
it'd be to increase the ratings before we rack
up too many points────

name: 咲耶
text:
それなりの数字を取りつづけられるなら、
あからさまな打ち切りを避けられるかもしれない
trans:
And if we can continue to reel in high numbers,
we might be able to avoid direct cancellation.

name: 咲耶
text: ……なんとか、その方法を見つけたくてね
trans: ...I want to find some way we can do that.

name: 摩美々
text: 恋鐘たちって、このこと知ってるのー
trans: Does Kogane and Mitsumine know about this?

name: 咲耶
text:
いや……私も聞いたばかりなんだ
本当のことかどうかもはっきりとはしない
trans:
No... I've only heard about the rumors.
I don't even know if they're true or not.

name: 咲耶
text:
これからドラマや舞台の準備が本格化するふたりに
負担をかけるのも気が引けて……
trans:
And I'd like to avoid adding to their burdens while
all the preparations for their drama and stage
performance is on the rise.

name: 恋鐘
text: 頭よくなるお弁当～
trans: A bento that makes you smart～

name: 霧子
text:
……
きっと……恋鐘ちゃんたちも……
trans:
...
I'm sure... Kogane-chan and Yuika-chan are...

name: 霧子
text:
わたしたちのこと……
気にしてる……
trans:
...thinking about...
us too...

name: 摩美々
text:
……はぁ
なんでうちってこんなに全員お節介なのー……
trans:
Haaa...
Why is everyone in our group such a busybody...?

name: 摩美々
text:
……じゃー、調べるー？
数字とってる番組のことー
trans:
...Welp, should we go look it up...?
...the kind of shows that get high ratings?

name: 咲耶
text: ──摩美々……
trans: ──Mamimi...

name: 霧子
text:
やる……
やりたい……摩美々ちゃん……！
trans:
Let's do it... 
I want to do it... Mamimi-chan...!

name: 霧子
text:
お勉強……しよう……！
みんなにいっぱい……見てもらえるように……
trans:
Let's... study them...!
So that... lots of people will watch us...

name: 咲耶
text:
……霧子
ああ────
trans:
Kiriko...
Yeah────

name: 咲耶
text:
私も賛成だ。どうなるにせよ、
このまま成り行きにまかせるよりずっといい────
trans:
I agree with you. No matter how this turns out,
it'll be much better than just leaving it up in the air.

name: 霧子
text: うん……！
trans: Yeah…!

name: 咲耶
text:
それじゃあ、カメラが止まる就寝タイムに
私の部屋に集合するのはどうだい？
trans:
Well then, once the cameras have stopped for
bedtime, shall we meet up in my room for the night?

name: 咲耶
text:
千里の道も一歩から。わずかでもいい
カメラの前で、映えていこうじゃないか──！
trans:
The journey of a thousand miles begins with
a single step. Just a little bit is alright.
Let's become photogenic for the camera!

name: 摩美々
text:
……っ
……そこまでやるとは────
trans:
...... 
...We don't have to go that far────

name: 咲耶
text:
クス、言い出したのは摩美々だろう
もちろん、意志は尊重するけれども？
trans:
Hehe, you're the one who brought it up in the first
place, Mamimi. Of course, who am I not to honor
your decision?

name: 摩美々
text:
…………
メロンかいちごのデザート付くんだったらぁ──
trans:
Maaaybe if you throw in a melon or strawberry
dessert to sweeten the deal.

name: 摩美々
text: 『《泣いたらアウト！　グッドラフ・テラス》は』
trans: ["Cry and You're Out! Goodlaugh Terrace" is...]

name: 摩美々
text:
『最強落ちないマスカラブランド
《グッドラフ》の提供でお届けします！』
trans:
[...brought to you by "Goodlaugh"...
The strongest mascara brand that won't rub off.]
